mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.tsks AS "tsks", a.nmzrcs AS "nmzrcs", a.ncyrs AS "ncyrs", a.kssycw AS "kssycw", a.kszyzlys AS "kszyzlys", a.kszchs AS "kszchs", a.doc_id AS "doc_id"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ironfo_feat_department( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, tsks, nmzrcs, ncyrs, kssycw, kszyzlys, kszchs, doc_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{tsks}, #{nmzrcs}, #{ncyrs}, #{kssycw}, #{kszyzlys}, #{kszchs}, #{doc_id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ironfo_feat_department SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, tsks = #{tsks}, nmzrcs = #{nmzrcs}, ncyrs = #{ncyrs}, kssycw = #{kssycw}, kszyzlys = #{kszyzlys}, kszchs = #{kszchs}, doc_id = #{doc_id} WHERE id = #{id}
